page.title: 06 Pets in West Stafford.
page.content: We wanted to Know how many children in our school had pets.We went round the classes and whilst two asked the questions another recorded the information on a chart. TYPE. NUMBER OF CHILDREN. PERCENTAGE DOGS 101 32.90% CATS 66 21.50% FISH 58 18.90% BIRDS 51 16.60% MICE & GERBILS 38 12.40% RABBITS 26 8.50% SNAKES 3 0.10% HORSE 2 0.07% TORTOISE 2 0.07% DONKEY 1 0.03% ALLIGATOR 1 0.03% Some children had more than one pet. Some had three dogs,for example ,but we didn't record amounts.If people had newts or tadpoles we didn't record them because the're wild and will be freed.
